mapper.select: SELECT comment.id, comment.user_id, board.id, comment.body, comment.is_anonymous, comment.created_at, comment.like_cnt FROM comment JOIN board ON board.id = comment.board_id WHERE board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(board_id, user_id, body, created_at, is_anonymous) VALUES (#{board_id}, #{user_id}, #{body}, NOW(), #{is_anonymous})
INSERT INTO comment_report(comment_id, user_id, report_id) VALUES (#{comment_id}, #{user_id}, #{report_id})
